verbose_text: SFB are known to drive autoimmune arthritis in this mouse model and it was shown that SFB induce an increase in the systemic Tfh cell populations by driving differentiation and egress of Tfh cells from intestinal Peyer 's patches into systemic lymphoid sites, leading to an increase in auto-antibody responses and to the development of arthritis.
evidence: SFB induce an increase in the systemic Tfh cell populations by driving differentiation
